column2: Add copy URL to clipboard for Gist creation dialog in GitHub plugin

column3: Adds an additional check box in the Create Gist dialog to copy the URL to clipboard.
How do you think, wouldn't it be better to replace these checkboxes with notification actions?
Ah, I knew there was a clipboard manager, just couldn't find it, thanks!

As for the notification actions suggestion, I do agree that it works a lot cleaner than adding an additional check box to the Gist creation dialog box, but I do personally like having it persistently remember the action. Seeing that the Open in browser action has both a check box and notification action would it be ok to do the same with the copy to clipboard action and have both a check box and notification action?

Hi!
If you want this option to be persistently remembered maybe it is better to move the setting to VCS -> GitHub settings page?

It's kind of something I want to be like the open in browser action. If I selected it last time I want it to remember, and if I didn't last time I don't want it to the next time. It's not something I really want hidden in a settings page, I'd rather have it out front when I'm about to upload.

Required functionality was implemented based on this pull request and merged.
